sentences.sentence: The app has also made me something of a sommelier of sounds.
sentences.translation: 这个应用程序也有我调酒师的声音。

sentences.sentence: A water sommelier handed out water menus with extravagant prices to the patrons.
sentences.translation: 一名服务员向顾客发放印有奢侈价格的水的价格单。

sentences.sentence: Here, some basic skills to help you pick up your glass with confidence the next time a sommelier pours you a taste.
sentences.translation: 一旦你掌握了以下这些基本的技巧，下一次碰上斟酒服务生让你尝酒的时候，你就可以信心十足地端起酒杯了。
